BR_text.BRsummary: Traced Keras “__hh” attrs unset on calling `load_model` when ModelCheckpoint callback used
BR_text.BRdescription:
See :meth:models.KerasModel.fit
 Grab all '__hh' attrs from model.layers before load_model call
 
 load_model screws with '<kernel/bias>_initializer' in particular by converting them to the dict representations used by Keras, rather than the user-friendly strings
 
 
 After setting self.model to result of load_model, revert the '__hh' attrs to saved values
